state: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to attempt to move east. That done, head south. Once you manage that, make an attempt to travel east. And then, venture north. Then, make an attempt to go west. Then, go to the south. Then, go south. And then, go to the east. After that, travel east. And then, go east. After that, travel east. With that done, make an effort to travel north. And then, attempt to take a trip north. That done, make an attempt to go east. And then, pick up the coin from the floor of the steam room. Alright, thanks! -= Sauna =- You're now in the sauna. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not? There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Sauna =-0/1
